item.title: Can no one help me?
item.dc:creator: @thekingpin thekingpin
item.description:
@thekingpin wrote:

Plz help guys no one is commenting on my threads, i really need help here

Hi guys i have a prob here with morrigans jav and axe specials,
to start off i have 2 servers, they both have morrigans axe and jav in them , and they both have the spec attacks coded in
combat assistant, but only one of them has the animations for the specials, in addition to this, even tho i have put the code for both spec attacks in the one that didn’t have them working, there is no spec bar for either of the items
Also in the working one, the spec attacks work perfectly, however i cannot find the animation for the spec attacks anywhere in the client or source, the server is called brokenX V2, i will put a download link here if you wish to try and find the animation yourself, which i would be very grateful for.

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9GY3IYNT

WHEN I SAY THIS, I MEAN THAT I CAN’T FIND THE FILE, I KNOW THE NUMBERS OF THE ANIMATIONS AND GFX, BUT I CANT FIND THE FILES THAT ARE THE ANIMATIONS ANYWHERE IN THE ABOVE SERVER LINK, EVEN THO THE SPECIAL ATTACKS WORK
THATS WHAT IM TRYING TO FIND, THE RAW ANIMATION AND GFX FILES FOR THE SPEC ATTACKS SO THEY WORK ON THE SERVER THAT THEY ARNT WORKING ON NOW

So im not sure what to do atm, i have tried searching 10504 and 10501 but nothing comes up
Im also pretty new to servers, so assume i know nothing,

here is the code i put in from brokenX into my server for the spec attack

[code]case 15015: // Morrigan Throwing Axe
c.usingRangeWeapon = true;
c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
c.getItems().deleteArrow();
c.lastWeaponUsed = weapon;
c.startAnimation(10501);
c.gfx0(1836);
c.hitDelay = 3;
c.specAccuracy = 2.00;
c.specDamage = 1.70;
c.projectileStage = 1;
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
if (c.fightMode == 2)
c.attackTimer–;
if (c.playerIndex > 0)
fireProjectilePlayer();
else if (c.npcIndex > 0)
fireProjectileNpc();
break;

		case 15016: // Morrigan Javelin
                                    c.usingRangeWeapon = true;
                            c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
                            c.getItems().deleteArrow();
                            c.lastWeaponUsed = weapon;
                            c.startAnimation(10504);
                            c.gfx0(1838);
                            c.specAccuracy = 2.50;
                            c.specDamage = 1.85;
                            c.hitDelay = 3;
                            c.projectileStage = 1;
                                    c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
                            if (c.fightMode == 2)
                            c.attackTimer--;
                            if (c.playerIndex > 0)
                            fireProjectilePlayer();
                            else if (c.npcIndex > 0)
                            fireProjectileNpc();
                            break; [/code]

thanks

Read full topic
